p: Based on the concatenated 10 cp PCGs from 46 published species of Caryophyllaceae, we constructed a Bayesian inference (BI) phylogenetic tree ( Figure 1) using MrBayes v3.1.1 (Milne et al. 2009) program integrated with TOPALi V2.5 software (Ronquist and Huelsenbeck 2003) to further study the phylogenetic position of S dichotoma. From the BI phylogenetic tree analysis, we find that S. dichotoma and Pseudostellaria okamotoi (MH879018) are closely related to each other within the family Caryophyllaceae ( Figure 1).
